channel_id.description: the channel id of the channel

psbt.description: the PSBT of the funding transaction

commitments_secured.description: whether the *psbt* is complete (if true, sign *psbt* and call `openchannel_signed` to complete the channel open)

funding_outnum.description: The index of the funding output in the psbt

close_to.description: scriptPubkey which we have to close to if we mutual close
